DOC.brief_summary: To define any changes in whole body oxygen consumption that occur following major vascular surgery (open aortic aneurysm surgery; endovascular aortic aneurysm repair; and infra-inguinal lower limb revascularisation procedures).
DOC.brief_title: Study of Post-operative Oxygen Consumption Following Vascular Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients presenting for major vascular surgery at the Royal Infirmary of Edinburgh Patient refusal
